page.title: 02A Denmead Family's Day
page.content: We asked a teacher from our school, who lives in Denmead, to tell us about a typical day in her family's life. The teacher is Head of the Geography Department whilst her husband is a computer expert for the Government working at a local Ministry Of Defence establishment. A typical day for them is as follows: 6:30-7:30a.m. Baby wakes and has her bottle. 7:00a.m. Get ready for work and make the beds. 7:15-7:45a.m. Cook breakfast and prepare packed lunch. 7:45-8:00a.m. Tidy house. 8:00-8:20a.m. Take baby to baby minder and settle her. Husband leaves for work. 8:20-8:40a.m. Drive through country lanes to work.
